page.title: 11CLUBS IN WADEBRIDGE FOR BOYS
page.content: {ST.JOHNS AMBULANCE BRIGADE} There are 14 boys from 8 to 12 years and four leaders. The meetings take place at the Ambulance Hall on Thursday evenings.Apart from First Aid Instruction there is also chance to play in the band. {SCOUTS AND CUB SCOUTS }The Scout Hut is next to Molesworth Street Car Park. There are 34 cubs who meet at 6.00 p.m. every Thursday. In the winter they do craft and skill tests with indoor games. In the summer there are many outdoor activities . At 12 years boys can join the scouts. {MODEL CAR RACING CLUB} Boys from 8 years may join and there are 26 members who meet on Wednesdays and Sundays to race radio control electric cars. In winter the venue is The Wills Hall on Egloshayle Road ; in summer atrack at Sladesbridge is used.
